definition: civil police/PRC police/abbr. for 人民警察
privately run (i.e. by a company, not the state)
among the people/popular/folk/non-governmental/involving people rather than governments

sentences.english: Some agents have 20-30 employees on a monthly payroll, he said.
sentences.chinese: 一些代理每月会有20至30民雇员，他补充道。

sentences.english: The result of this rule for Okinawans is that they end up eating fewer calories than most people.
sentences.chinese: 这一方法使冲绳岛民摄入的卡路里比大多数人要少。

sentences.english: Only a remnant who lives in those cities will repent.
sentences.chinese: 在那些城里，只有余民悔改。

sentences.english: The fourth part of the thesis is of referring to traditional people-based thoughts to construct service-oriented government.
sentences.chinese: 借鉴传统民本思想构建服务型政府。

sentences.english: Jieyou lived in Wusun for more than 50 years and enjoyed the love and respect of the Wusun people.
sentences.chinese: 她在乌孙国生活了五十多年，深受乌孙人民的爱戴。

sentences.english: Police dog guards the peace of the Yuzhno-Kurilsk citizens.
sentences.chinese: 警犬守护着南库里尔斯克市民的安全。

sentences.english: Now the city was large and great: but the people were few therein, and the houses were not builded.
sentences.chinese: 城是广大，其中的民却稀少，房屋还没有建造。

sentences.english: Now it came to pass that Naas the king of the children of Ammon died, and his son reigned is his stead.
sentences.chinese: 此后阿孟子民的君王纳哈士死了，他的儿子继位为王。

sentences.english: How can people know the contact information of each survey?
sentences.chinese: 巿民大众如何得知每次民意调查的样本资料？

sentences.english: It thus seems that people are rather positive about this year's address.
sentences.chinese: 由此看来，巿民似乎对施政报告有不错的评价。

sentences.english: There's a building guarded by the local militia at the corner of the street.
sentences.chinese: 街道拐角处有一幢由当地民兵团守卫的大楼。

sentences.english: The main idea is the people are more important than the kings.
sentences.chinese: 民贵君轻，民心向背是儒家民本思想的主旨。

sentences.english: Based on the idea of Ren(being humane), people attach importance to man-oriented management.
sentences.chinese: 民本管理是中国传统管理宝库的瑰宝。

sentences.english: It was to be a place never forgotten in Israel's future.
sentences.chinese: 这是为要使以色列民世世不忘。

sentences.english: Now serve the Lord your God and his people Israel.
sentences.chinese: 现在要事奉耶和华你们的神，服事他的民以色列。

definition: Aimin district of Mudanjiang city 牡丹江市, Heilongjiang
Han ethnic group/Chinese (language)/the Han dynasty (206 BC-220 AD)
surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy
to live in peace and work happily (idiom)

public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)
